description: a spunky tech covered in grease.
response:
Hey there Auriga-7B! What are you doing up here?
If you're looking for upgrades, you should try the Supply Closet.
Golly gee willikers, I need to get up the attic and do a diagnostic on server 42!

Did you run a diagnostic on 42? You've got to look close to understand the commands on
that machine. It's really weird. Sometimes I think it can understand what I'm thinking
but that's crazy, right!?
name: Lisa
